naslov: Sveta Nedelja - Novaki - Luksuzna obiteljska kuća - 250m2 (prodaja) (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodajemo obiteljsku kuću površine 250m2 sa 350m2 okućnice. Kuća je projektirana posebno za potrebe obitelji uz pomoć njemačkih arhitekata. Interijer se sastoji od 5 soba, ureda, kuhinje, izbe, dvije kupaonice, centralno smještenog osmerokutnog stepeništa te natkrivene terase površine 65m2. Kuća je podijeljena na dnevni i noćni dio sukladno potrebama obitelji tako da se na gornjoj etaži nalaze spavaće sobe i velika kupaona koje predstavljaju noćni dio, te prizemlje koje je osmišljeno kao dnevni dio kuće sa velikim dnevnim boravkom, modernim kaminom i blagavaonom (cca 50m2) te odvojenom kuhinjom, izbom, kupaonom, radnom sobom. Kuća ima izrazito dobro osmišljenu komunikaciju izmedju prostorija. Gornja etaža je klimatizirana. Grijanje je centralno na plin te zbog izrazito dobrih izolacijskih svojstava kuće troškovi grijanja i hladjenja su izrazito niski. Cijela okućnica je potpuno uredjena. Walk-in ormar u spavaćoj sobi te ugradbeni ormar u predulazu. Cijelokupna kuća je osigurana profesionalnim alarmnim sustavom te video nadzorom. Ulazna vrata se kontroliraju tipkovnicom na PIN. Punjač za električne automobile u sklopu parkirnog mjesta. Vrhunski materijali korišteni prilikom gradnje eksterijera i interijera. U neposrednoj blizini se nalazi škola, vrtići, trgovine (Lidl, Plodine, Tommy...), ordinacija opće medicine, stomatolog, ljekarna, brojni sportski sadržaji, igrališta. Izuzetno dobra prometna povezanost sa Zagrebom, priključkom na autocestu, Alejom Bologne ili Ljubljanskom avenijom. Udaljenost do Trga bana Jelačića iznosi 14km. Kupovina direktno od vlasnika bez agencijske provizije. HR kontakt broj/WhatsApp: +385 99 8152 436 DE kontakt broj/WhatsApp: +49 173 8566 848 ———————————————————————— We are selling a family house with a living area of 250m² and a landscaped yard of 350m². The house was specially designed for family needs with the help of German architects. The interior consists of 5 rooms, an office, a kitchen, pantry, two bathrooms, a centrally located octagonal staircase, and a covered terrace of 65m². The house is divided into a day and night area according to family needs – the upper floor contains the bedrooms and a large bathroom, forming the night section, while the ground floor is designed as the day area with a spacious living room, modern fireplace, and dining area (approx. 50m²), as well as a separate kitchen, pantry, bathroom, and office. The layout offers excellent room-to-room flow. The upper floor is air-conditioned. Heating is central gas, and thanks to the house’s excellent insulation, heating and cooling costs are very low. The entire yard is fully landscaped. There is a walk-in closet in the master bedroom and a built-in wardrobe in the entrance hall. The house is secured with a professional alarm system and video surveillance. The front door is operated via a PIN keypad. An EV charger is included with the parking space. Top-quality materials were used throughout the construction of both the exterior and interior. In the immediate vicinity, you’ll find schools, kindergartens, shops (Lidl, Plodine, Tommy…), a general practitioner’s office, a dentist, a pharmacy, numerous sports facilities, and playgrounds. The property has excellent transport connections to Zagreb, with easy access to the highway, Aleja Bologne, or Ljubljanska Avenue. The distance to Ban Jelačić Square is 14 km. Purchase directly from the owner – no agency commission. HR contact number/WhatsApp: +385 99 8152 436 DE contact number/WhatsApp: +49 173 8566 848
